Name: Node
Description: Holds nodes in a network that input data perform an operation and output a variable.

Properties.Name: name
Properties.Description: Holds a name for the node.

Properties.Name: inputConnections
Properties.Description: List of nodes that contain inputs.

Properties.Name: value
Properties.Description: The value of the node on this execution run

Properties.Name: executed
Properties.Description: Wether or not this node has been executed since it was last cleared.

Properties.Name: protected
Properties.Description: If true, disables the clear function

Properties.Name: hasTrainableVariables
Properties.Description: True if Node has trainable variables

Properties.Name: ID
Properties.Description: A unique identifier of the node used for export and import

Functions.Name: __init__
Functions.Description: init function sets up key variables.

Functions.Name: getValue
Functions.Description: Returns Node output, will store value for future calls. Made to be overwritten

Functions.Name: execute
Functions.Description: Produces an output based on input connection values.

Functions.Name: clear
Functions.Description: Clears value from execution. Will not clear if protected.

Functions.Name: protectedClear
Functions.Description: Clears value from execution even if protected.

Functions.Name: getTrainableVariables

Returns.Description: By default, empty list. This is overridden by children.

Functions.Description: Returns trainable tf.Variables as a list.

MandatoryArgs.Name: connections
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of nodes to connect to. Order may be important. Updates inputConnections.

Functions.Name: exportNode

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Returns.Description: The access path used. This is used for overloading.

Functions.Description: Exports ID, and connections. Checks directory existence and validity.

MandatoryArgs.Name: myPath
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to. Has to be called myPath to avoid a collision.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Returns.Description: The access path used. This is used for overloading.
A list of node IDs to connect to this node. This is because the connections can only be resolved when all nodes have been imported.

Notes: This is used as a template for types of nodes including junctions,layers,inputs, and outputs
